bibl.title: Notes on Magical Handbooks
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Lund. Inv. 2091 + P. Yale Inv. 1206 verso
Michael Zellmann-Rohrer, Notes on Magical Handbooks.
bibl.note: 1. Metrical incantations. P. Berol. Inv. 21243 (Suppl. Mag. II, 72; B.K.T. IX, 147; P.G.M. CXXII). - 2. Hexametrical incantations. Further columns and a new fragment for P.CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1206 (Suppl. Mag. II, 76; P.G.M. CXXVII). - Addition: Medical recipe(s). Edition of P.CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1206 + P. Lund. Inv. 2091 verso. Arsinoite (?), 2nd-3rd cent. CE. - 3. Metrical incantations. P.G.M. XX and Suppl. Mag. II, 88. - 4. Invocation formula. The front and provenance of P.G.M. XVIIb (P. Stras. Inv. 1179). - 5. Invocation formula. The provenance and the deities of P.G.M. LXIX.
